name: Comment down below how fast you speedrun the game (SpeedRun game)
name_original: Comment down below how fast you speedrun the game (SpeedRun game)
description:
this game is basically a speedrun game and you have to comment how fast you beated the game.also if the time dosen't show in the game here use this https://vclock.com/stopwatch/ 
or you can use a stop watch on your phone or tablet
also you can play this normaly or you can speedrun if you want
anyway i don't know if im gonna make this for android tell me in the comments!
